issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I'm facing issues with IOS 9.1 on iPhone 6  . I upgraded TI SDK to 5.0.2 GA , and when try to run app on iPhone 6 plus device , all icons , text , images getting enlarged . It works fine on iPad . 

This issue is on IPHONE 6 device , simulator works fine .

Specifications :
Node : v0.12.7
Appc Studio : 4.4.0
CLI version : 4.1.2
Ti SDK : 5.0.2 GA
IOS SDK : 9.1
fields.environment:
Specifications :
Node : v0.12.7
Appc Studio : 4.4.0
CLI version : 4.1.2
Ti SDK : 5.0.2 GA
IOS SDK : 9.1

comments.body:
Hello,

Please use the latest Ti SDK version, also provide a test case that replicates the issue.

Thanks.
Hello [~jyotigupta275], The issue is in your iPhone6 Plus device. You should follow this link [here|http://ipod.about.com/od/iphonehowtos/f/My-Iphone-Icons-Are-Huge-Whats-Happening.htm]. Thanks.
